roleset.name: denote, mean, stand for, be indicative of

example.name: signify-v: transitive
example.text: Uptick -- An expression signifying that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previous transaction in that security .

propbank.arg: that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previous transaction in that security

example.name: signify-v: transitive
example.text: `` He does n't signify what people want , so the unrest will go on , '' Mr. Oldenburg predicts .

example.name: significant-j: Both args
example.text: The town 's generous library budget is significant of the value its residents place on learning .

propbank.arg: of the value its residents place on learning

example.name: significant-j: with GOL
example.text: In truth , the electoral result seemed significant to me of the fact that , as I have thought and said for many years now , this country is quite politically ill .

propbank.arg: of the fact that , as I have thought and said for many years now , this country is quite politically ill

roleset.note: SIGNIFICANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ, signify.01.(from significant.01-j)

roleset.name: notable in size or importance

role.descr: cause or reason of notability. ONLY IN USE FOR THYME
notable for whom or what; topic. ONLY IN USE FOR THYME

example.name: significant-j: arg1
example.text: And though the size of the loan guarantees approved yesterday is significant , recent experience with a similar program in Central America indicates that it could take several years before the new Polish government can fully use the aid effectively .

propbank.arg: the size of the loan guarantees approved yesterday

example.name: significant-j: With PRD, CAU (note under THYME arg structure that ARGM-CAU here would be ARG2)
example.text: ... the Base Flagpole is significant as an object for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the origins and history of Williams Air Force Base ( now Phoenix - Mesa GatewayAirport ) .

propbank.arg: for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the origins and history of Williams Air Force Base ( now Phoenix - Mesa GatewayAirport )

example.name: significant-j, ARGs 1 and 3
example.text: The degradation due to wind shear was significant for three of the five subjects .
example.amr: (s / significant-02 :ARG1 (d / degrade-01 :ARG0 (s2 / shear-01 :ARG0 (w / wind))) :ARG3 (s3 / subject :quant 3 :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 (s4 / subject :quant 5))))

roleset.note: ARG2 and ARG3 added based on THYME.
SIGNIFICANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. (from significant.02-j)
